sourcesContent:
export const ContactUsContent = () => { return (

MV AGUSTA FACTORY

VIA GIOVANNI MACCHI, 144
21100 VARESE VA
ITALY

+39 0332 254443

INFO@MVAGUSTA.COM

GET IN TOUCH

We are committed to following up on any support request from our customers and supporters. You can reach out to our customer care team by simply sending us an email to info@mvagusta.com Please specify your contact reason. SERVICE REQUESTS AND PRODUCT INFORMATION:

Alongside your request, make sure you provide important information such as VIN code of your bike, official MV Agusta dealer where the bike has been serviced, pictures or videos telling more about your issue.

Our customer care will answer your email within a few days.

CAREERS:

Your application will be handled by our Human Resources, who will be in contact should any relevant job opportunity arise.

COLLABORATIONS AND BUSINESS PROPOSALS:

Our procurement, sales and marketing teams will be informed of any proposal. Please be aware that direct feedback might not always be provided.

); };
